text:
@realDonaldTrump Maybe West Virginia can shut down it's borders and urge isolation. It seems if one state can avoid the coronavirus the entire USA would be encouraged.
It yet may not be too late.  🇺🇸

God bless and protect the United States of America.

"For nothing will be impossible with God."
